Author: betty_draper_
Text: I’m 5’7 and my lowest was 142. I remember thinking I was HUGE and now I look back at those pictures and cry because I want to be that small again.  All my friends growing up were 5’2 and around 90 lbs. I totally get what you’re feeling. I always felt huge and like I was attractin attention when I wanted to be small and dainty like them. Shit sucks, I really feel you.

Author: adustydragon123
Text: I honestly thought I was my heaviest when I was my lowest :( there’s a dysmorphia that can accompany the weight loss.
